title: Rolling pin

properties.name: description
properties.value: The rolling pin is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest. To purchase, the player must have completed 6 of the Recipe for Disaster subquests. To wield, in addition to having 40 Attack, 7 subquests must be completed. This weapon has the same stats as the rune mace, including the prayer bonus. However, unlike the mace, it did not get updated to an attack speed of 4 along with the first stage of the 2021 equipment rebalance.

Item ID7445

The rolling pin is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest. To purchase, the player must have completed 6 of the Recipe for Disaster subquests. To wield, in addition to having 40 Attack, 7 subquests must be completed. This weapon has the same stats as the rune mace, including the prayer bonus. However, unlike the mace, it did not get updated to an attack speed of 4 along with the first stage of the 2021 equipment rebalance.
